data.text:
@stefanbar Amounts issues:

Total Liability Per Month in each case is showing millions.
Total Child Maintenance Amount Per Month per case is not adding multiple child amounts together.
Total Child Maintenance Amount Per Month per case is not escalating with percents.
Total Child Maintenance Amount Per Month per case is not showing an amount when escalating with a set amount.
Couldn't test variable amounts as case is verified but is not found on system. Case 2421.

Please see testing file emailed to you.

@gillianoberholzer
